definition: coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]

sentences.english: Chapter I of this article is outlined in the Anti-Money Laundering.
sentences.chinese: 本文第一章是反洗钱概述。

sentences.english: Tang Xu said the Chinese anti-money-laundering laws and gradually perfect the system.
sentences.chinese: 唐旭表示，中国反洗钱法律和制度体系逐渐完善。

sentences.english: We must crack down on offshore tax havens and money laundering.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须严厉打击海外避税港和洗钱活动。

sentences.english: Money Laundering is a complex high-intelligent crime, which is of severe danger to society.
sentences.chinese: 洗钱是一种具有严重社会危害性的复杂的高智商犯罪。

sentences.english: He is retiring from the triad and money-lending business.
sentences.chinese: 他是退休的黑社会和洗钱的贷款业务。

sentences.english: Nine of them are also charged with money laundering.
sentences.chinese: 其中九人还被控洗钱罪。

sentences.english: Part four: The concept and constitution characteristics of Money Laundering crime in our nation.
sentences.chinese: 第四部分，我国刑法中洗钱罪的概念和构成特征。

sentences.english: Khodorkovsky now awaits another trial on fresh charges of embezzlement and money-laundering.
sentences.chinese: 霍多尔科夫斯基现在正等着一项贪污和洗钱的新审判。

sentences.english: Lazarenko is currently serving in the U. S. for money laundering.
sentences.chinese: 拉扎连科目前在美国因洗钱罪服刑。

sentences.english: Police said the amount of money-laundering gang of up to 1 billion pounds.
sentences.chinese: 警方称，该团伙洗钱金额高达1亿英镑。

sentences.english: This restaurant is just a front for money laundering.
sentences.chinese: 这家餐馆仅仅是洗钱的掩护所。

sentences.english: This section discusses the penalties for money laundering offenses and penalties applicable settings.
sentences.chinese: 该部分论述了洗钱罪的刑罚设置和刑罚适用。

sentences.english: That’s when I began to realize that they were using the games to launder cash.
sentences.chinese: 那时我才开始意识到他们是在用这些系统来洗钱。

sentences.english: He's also been convicted by a French court in his absence on money-laundering charges.
sentences.chinese: 他还被法国法庭缺席审判犯有洗钱罪。

sentences.english: Today, Dubai is the money-laundering heart of the Muslim world.
sentences.chinese: 如今，迪拜已成为穆斯林世界的洗钱中心。

sentences.english: We don't want anything to do with laundering dirty money with drug dealers.
sentences.chinese: 我们不要跟贩毒品的人进行的洗钱活动有任何关系。

definition: to smuggle/to have an illicit affair
